name: C4D Woocommerce Category
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
This simple plugin creates a category widget that allows you select the category to display

  • Select category you want instead show all category

  • Limit the number of category display

  • Show count post in category

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘c4d woo category
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Woo Category.
  2. Upload the ‘c4d-woo-category directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate plugin from your Plugins page.
